Articles.Content:
http://www.mathniac.com/

This website is completely blank, and only contains an equation.   

Oh I figured out what it is.  When I click on the image of the equation, it gives a pseudoscience video about hidden golden spirals.

That was quick.

Interestingly, I discovered one site that linked to it-

It is apparently one of those "maze" websites with hundreds of linked images that go to random pages.    

http://www.dirkster.com/TheTreasure.htm

For example, random beaches with gifs of cheetahs, each of which leads to more random drawings.

http://www.importer.org/Smuggler.html

Weird, odd, strange.

What brought you to the site?
